name: Inappropriate Llama Disaster!
description:
Inappropriate Llama Disaster was originally created in a MEDIATONIC “game jam”. The stupid llama made us all laugh so much that we decided you might like it too – so we added lots more art, writing and polish to make it into an actual thing we can actually show to people. We hope you enjoy it! MEDIATONIC.


User Reviews

“I AM VERY STUPID AND USUALLY DON’T KNOW HOW TO PLAY GAMES BUT THIS GAME ONLY HAS ONE BUTTON AND I WAS ABLE TO PRESS IT SUCCESSFULLY ON ONLY MY THIRD TRY. FIVE STARS” – J. Tanton

“I introduced a llama into the bedroom! It was QUITE something!
...Game? What game?” – P. Croft

“Very poor. I spent an entire bus ride playing but I couldn’t find a single “inappropriate” time to bring on any llamas. And neither could my grandmother, whose lap I was sat on, naked.” - O. Smith

--- MORE INFO ---

Mediatonic are the creators of online games such as Amateur Surgeon, Who's That Flying?, Meowcenaries and Gigolo Assassin. For more information about Mediatonic head to: http://www.mediatonic.co.uk
